de.slothsoft.charts

Interface RefreshListener


  • public interface RefreshListener
    A listener that is used whenever an objects needs refreshing and wants to comunicate this fact.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RefreshListener.Event
      Event for the RefreshListener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void refreshNeeded(RefreshListener.Event event)
      This method indicates something changed on the event's source in a way that makes refreshing necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshNeeded

        void refreshNeeded(RefreshListener.Event event)
        This method indicates something changed on the event's source in a way that makes refreshing necessary.
        Parameters:
        event - an event with the details; never null
